mapper.select: select id, name, room_type, role_type, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from biz_room_manage where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into biz_room_manage(name, room_type, role_type, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{roomType}, #{roleType}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into biz_room_manage(name, room_type, role_type, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.roomType}, #{entity.roleType}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into biz_room_manage(name, room_type, role_type, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.roomType}, #{entity.roleType}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update name = values(name), room_type = values(room_type), role_type = values(role_type), create_by = values(create_by), update_by = values(update_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update biz_room_manage
name = #{name},
room_type = #{roomType},
role_type = #{roleType},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
